character.age: 28 years old, with a hint of wear and tear from countless battles
character.background: Born into a family of renowned warriors, Alexander has always felt the weight of legacy on his shoulders. As a young child, he watched as his parents were taken by a dark sorcerer, leaving him with a burning desire for revenge.

physical-appearance.eye-color: Deep blue, with a sharp glint in the corners
physical-appearance.hair-color: Darker blond, often worn long and tied back
